title: imal_io
author: imal_io
content: What do we want to achieve with IMAL?IMAL project; It is a project that provides funds to animal shelters and animal associations in the payments you make while meeting all the needs of your pet.The project will include many components that will provide convenience to all animal lovers. At the same time, resources will be allocated from payment transactions and project revenues to support stray animals.We will transfer the funds allocated for donation to animal shelters and animal associations.With the Play to Earn system, both you and street animals in need of help and care will win. You can help them with their daily work at no extra cost.Your small donations will grow and it will be a meaningful project to reach wider audiences and serve stray animals together with you.We will share about all the services offered on our site and social media platforms, follow the details.Website: imal.ioWhitepaper: whitepaper.pdfTwitter: imal_ioReddit: imalDiscord:  imalTelegram:  imal_ioLinkedin:  imal-ioAndroid Play to Earn App: Pet Game
